Terms of Service

Please read these terms carefully before using our service. This is a binding agreement.

Last updated: October 28, 2025

1. Agreement to Terms

By creating an account or using the **Trace'N Find** service ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these **Terms of Service** ("Terms") and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.

This Service is provided as a **Final Year Project** by students of the German-Malaysian Institute (GMI). It is offered "as-is" for demonstration and academic purposes.

2. User Accounts

To use the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process. You are responsible for **safeguarding your password** and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

3. Use of the Service

Trace'N Find grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Service for its intended purpose: tracking and managing devices you own.

You agree NOT to:

  • Use the Service to **track, monitor, or obtain information** about any person or device without their express legal consent.
  • Use the Service for any illegal, harassing, or malicious purpose.
  • Reverse-engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the Service.
  • Interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of the Service or its underlying (Firebase) infrastructure.

Using this Service to illegally monitor another individual is a severe violation of these Terms and may be a **criminal offense**. We will cooperate fully with law enforcement in such cases.

4. Security Features

The Service provides features such as Remote Lock, **Remote Wipe**, and Alarm (the "Security Features"). These features are provided "as-is."

  • Remote Wipe: You acknowledge that initiating a Remote Wipe command is **irreversible** and will result in the permanent deletion of all data on the target device. We are not liable for any data loss resulting from the use of this feature.
  • Service Dependency: The Security Features require the target device to be powered on and have a stable internet connection (Wi-Fi or cellular). We cannot guarantee these features will work in all circumstances (e.g., if the device is off, in airplane mode, or destroyed).

5. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. You may terminate your own account at any time through the account settings page.

6. Disclaimer of Warranties

As this is an academic project, the Service is provided on an **"AS IS"** and **"AS AVAILABLE"** basis. We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the operation or availability of the Service, or that it will be uninterrupted, error-free, or 100% accurate. You use the Service at your own risk.

7. Limitation of Liability

In no event shall Trace'N Find, its students, or its faculty supervisors (GMI) be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any **data loss**, including loss resulting from a failed backup or a successful Remote Wipe; or (iv) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

  • By email: legal@trace-n-find.com
  • By visiting our Contact Page.
